summary: The diff shows modifications to About.tsx and Home.tsx, but the award images used are WhatsApp images stored under '/assets/' (not '/assets/generated/'), not the required 'award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg' files. Neither requirement REQ-73 nor REQ-74 appears to be implemented as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page so that all 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) render with src paths starting with '/assets/generated/', correct alt text, explicit container size with object-fit: cover, and no CSS rules that hide or zero-size the images. Static asset files must exist at frontend/public/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified About.tsx uses WhatsApp image filenames under '/assets/' rather than '/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg' through '/assets/generated/award-photo-04.jpeg'. The founderAwards array contains 7 entries using WhatsApp images, not the 4 required award-photo-XX.jpeg files. No static asset files named award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the Awards & Recognition sub-section on the Home page so that all 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) render with src paths starting with '/assets/generated/', correct alt text, explicit container size with object-fit: cover, and no CSS rules that hide or zero-size the images.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified Home.tsx uses WhatsApp image filenames under '/assets/' rather than '/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg' through '/assets/generated/award-photo-04.jpeg'. The founderAwards array contains 7 entries using WhatsApp images, not the 4 required award-photo-XX.jpeg files.

hallucinated_features.description: Awards section expanded to 7 awards using WhatsApp image assets instead of the specified 4 award-photo-XX.jpeg files from '/assets/generated/'
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies exactly 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) served from '/assets/generated/'. Both About.tsx and Home.tsx instead implement 7 awards using WhatsApp images from '/assets/', which was not requested.
